subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bryce Harper and Danny Espinosa homered as Washington increased its winning streak to five, tying a season best. The Los Angeles Dodgers signed outfielder Andre Ethier to an $85 million deal.
snippet: Bryce Harper and Danny Espinosa homered as Washington increased its winning streak to five, tying a season best. The Los Angeles Dodgers signed outfielder Andre Ethier to an $85 million deal.
